Key Match Events: Cameroon won 4-1 against Kenya in the 2025 Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON) qualifiers
Aboubakar opened the floodgates when he found the back of the net with only five minutes played
Hongla doubled the Indomitable Lions tally in the 39th minute
Olunga gave Kenya a lifeline when he reduced the deficit in the 41st minute
Mbeumo stretched the Indomitable Lions’ lead, off a cross from Bassogog in the 43rd minute for a 3-1 lead at the half-time
Bassong inscribed his name in the scoresheet after he finished off a cross from Hongla in the 55th minute
Pre-Game Insights: Harambee Stars under head coach Engin Firat needed a positive result to keep alive their hopes of qualifying for a seventh appearance at the 35th edition of the biennial African football tournament
Coach Firat moved to make changes to Kenya’s squad that had beaten Namibia 2-1 in their matchday two fixture
Onsika predicted a disastrous outing for Kenya saying the opening two matches against Zimbabwe and Namibia exposed their weaknesses
Post-Match Reflections: Onsika blamed Kenya’s display on a lack of creativity and confidence within the playing unit
Onsika said Kenya deserved the thrashing and couldn’t have picked any better result than what they got
Onsika said the entire team was down on agility, concentration was poor, passes not reaching the target, confidence was poor, the entire team was overrun by Cameroon
Onsika called on coach Firat to put his house in order as they prepare to face Cameroon in their matchday four fixture
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kenya coach Firat introduced Okumu for Amos Nondi at the start of the second half in a bid to stop Cameroon from adding to their advantage
Onsika praised Erick Ouma for his performance saying he was the best player for Harambee Stars in the game
The 2025 edition of the Africa Cup of Nations will be hosted by Morocco for the second time and the first since 1988
Others: Onsika suggested that Matasi should be dropped from the national team
Onsika said players who do the things that Matasi is doing continuously should not be allowed in the national team
Taib said the bitter truth is they shall never make it with that type of selection and play
